
- ![ foo ](/url)
- ![foo](/url)
- ![ foo](/url)
- ![foo ](/url)
- ![      foo     ](/url)
- Starts with `^`
    - ![ ^foo ](/url)
    - ![^foo](/url)
- Multi lines
  - ![ foo
      bar ](/url)
  - ![foo
      bar](/url)
  - ![
      foo
      bar
    ](/url)
  - ![  
      foo
      bar  
    ](/url)
- Empty
  - ![](/url)
  - ![ ](/url)
  - ![      ](/url)

[x]: /url
